ModMetaData.name: Cash Register (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Zaljerem
ModMetaData.description:
Original mod by Orion https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2506046833 GNU General Public License All the same, if the original author requests it, I will remove this update.
packageID of Orion.CashRegister has been retained for compatibility purposes. Please unsub from the original for 1.6.
--
Highlights:
- Some code cleanup - Can now have up to 50 pawns assigned as waitstaff (should be more than enough? lol) - still need to tweak the scrolling of the window
--
Original mod notes (1.5):
Build a cash register to control the settings of your restaurant. Doesn't do anything on its own.
Has to be loaded before mods that depend on it.
